sense.gloss: setting a question (for an exam, quiz, etc.)
setting a theme (for composition of poetry)

sdata.j: ↑最終↑↓さいしゅう↓↑試験↑↓しけん↓でボブは↑全↑↓まった↓くひどい↑目↑↓め↓にあった。↑出題↑↓|しゅつだい|↓↑範囲↑↓はんい↓が↑講義↑↓こうぎ↓の↑全↑↓すべ↓てにわたっていたのだ。
sdata.e: At his final exam, Bob was really put through the wringer; the test covered everything that was in the course.

sdata.j: どういった↑時事↑↓じじ↓が↑公務員↑↓こうむいん↓↑試験↑↓しけん↓で↑出題↑↓|しゅつだい|↓されるのか。
sdata.e: What sort of current affairs appear in the civil service examination?
